name: CreateGithubFork
description:
Create a fork of a GitHub repository for the user.

Create a fork of a GitHub repository for the authenticated user. Note that the forking process happens asynchronously and might take some time. Contact GitHub support if it takes longer than 5 minutes.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the GitHub repository. This name is not case-sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository to fork. It's not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: new_fork_name
parameters.description: Specify a new name for the forked repository when forking an existing repository.

value_schema.description: When forking from an existing repository, a new name for the fork.

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: Optional. Specify the organization name to fork into. If not provided, the fork will default to the user's account.

value_schema.description: Optional parameter to specify the organization name if forking into an organization.

parameters.name: fork_default_branch_only
parameters.description: Set to true to fork only the default branch of the repository.

value_schema.description: When forking from an existing repository, fork with only the default branch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: default_branch_only
parameters.description: When forking from an existing repository, fork with only the default branch.

value_schema.description: When forking from an existing repository, fork with only the default branch.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: When forking from an existing repository, a new name for the fork.

value_schema.description: When forking from an existing repository, a new name for the fork.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: Optional parameter to specify the organization name if forking into an organization.

value_schema.description: Optional parameter to specify the organization name if forking into an organization.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
